item.title: connectors
item.description: Services DataCredentialService rpc GetCredentialsInfo(DatasetCredentialsRequest) returns (DatasetCredentials) DataCatalogService rpc GetDatasetInfo(CatalogDatasetRequest) returns (CatalogDatasetInfo) rpc RegisterDatasetInfo(RegisterAssetRequest) returns (RegisterAssetResponse) PolicyManagerService rpc GetPoliciesDecisions(ApplicationContext) returns (PoliciesDecisions) Types Credentials Field Type Description Required accessKey string access credential for the bucket where the asset is stored No secretKey string No username string No password string No apiKey string api key assigned to the bucket in which the asset is stored
